about_the_game:
Transform your supermarket into a cleaner, brighter space with the siMarket: Clean & Decorate DLC! This exciting update introduces 15 new products, focusing on essential cleaning and hygiene items. Stock up on everything your customers need to keep their homes sparkling, from surface cleaners to hand sanitizers. Ensure your store is the go-to destination for all things clean and fresh.

In addition to new products, customize your store’s look with a variety of paint materials. Whether you want to create a vibrant, welcoming atmosphere or a sleek, modern vibe, the new paint options give you the creative freedom to design the perfect look for your supermarket walls.



To top it all off, enhance your store's layout with two unique shelving options: the Pyramid shelf and the Corner shelf. These stylish new fixtures are not only functional but also add an aesthetic touch, helping you display your new products in an eye-catching way that maximizes space. Elevate your supermarket’s appeal with this must-have DLC!
